comments.OFA_model_path: The path for OFA model weights can be downloaded from huggingface or the link I provided, and then modify the path
comments.gpt_model_name: The model of the GPT model, which is the API I am currently applying for

comments.output_file_path: Path to import text data files after batch extraction
